From: Lin Hurst <lin@thelastmileleaders.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2024-09-25 12:18
Subject: ❗❗LAST CALL❗❗ - Win $25 - Last-Mile Insights Survey
--------------------------------------------------
CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن

Last-mile industry needs your insights - Share your expertise

Dear Hagop,

 

Here's your chance to share with us your expertise and win $25 on completion of the survey focussing on Europe's Last Mile Trends.

 

By doing this, you become a valuable part of the industry's ONLY PRIMARY REPORT on the state of the last-mile.

 

Your thoughts and insights mean a lot to us and we urge you to take this survey which would take less than 10 minutes.
